feed.title: qBitController Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for qBitController: qBitController v0.8.1
entry.content:
Additions

  • Added swipe actions on torrent list
  • Added subcategory support (for qBittorrent version 4.6.0 and above)
  • Added ability to view all articles in the current RSS folder
  • Added ability to search in RSS feeds
  • Added ability to set torrent category on torrent list screen
  • Added in-app language chooser

Changes

  • Improved tracker parsing
  • Country flags are now shown on torrent peers

Fixes

  • Fixed legacy icons
  • Fixed minor issues and crashes

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Bartuzen/qBitController/compare/v0.8.0...v0.8.1

entry.title: New release for qBitController: qBitController v0.8.2
entry.content:
Additions

  • Enabled predictive back gesture

Changes

  • Links in torrent comments are now clickable

Fixes

  • Fixed app crashing on lower Android versions
  • Fixed a minor crash

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Bartuzen/qBitController/compare/v0.8.1...v0.8.2

entry.title: New release for qBitController: qBitController v0.8.3
entry.content:
Additions

  • Added reset filter option to search result

Changes

  • Minor UI changes

Fixes

  • Fixed default Auto TMM option not working when adding torrent
  • Fixed minor issues

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Bartuzen/qBitController/compare/v0.8.2...v0.8.3

entry.title: New release for qBitController: qBitController v0.8.4
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed issues with older qBittorrent versions

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Bartuzen/qBitController/compare/v0.8.3...v0.8.4

entry.title: New release for qBitController: qBitController v0.8.5
entry.content:
Additions

  • Added inactive seeding time limit to torrent options

Changes

  • RSS articles are now marked as read when clicked on download button
  • Peer download and upload speed are now displayed on peer list
  • Alternative speed limits option is moved to speed limits dialog

Fixes

  • Reverted internal changes that created problems, especially on older qBittorrent versions

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Bartuzen/qBitController/compare/v0.8.4...v0.8.5
